title: Tracker - An experiment in pixel font.
content:
I created this font on FontStruct, but I made some changes to the lowercase 'a' in paint.  
While not the first font I've ever worked on, it is the first font I've ever finished.

Because it was created on FontStruct, I had little to no control over the spacing.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Tracker](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414191944/http:/typophile.com/files/Tracker.PNG) | 3.98 KB |
author: Maxx-W
